sentence.Network_en: Be careful, don't buy a schlock car with a pretty design.
sentence.Network_cn: 小心, 不要买品质差造型美的车.

sentence.Network_en: The film is a piece of schlock.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一部粗制滥造的电影片子.

sentence.Network_en: The endless rows of tiny stalls offer mainly mass - produced schlock and dreadful knock - offs.
sentence.Network_cn: 无数排小摊子上出售大批量复制的小器物和样子难看的仿制品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 次品(Schlock)先生似乎鼻涕虫先生得将就这再没芥末的情况下吃香肠了你的逻辑还是那样毫无纰漏次品先生但我刚才说的是曲速引擎我得说现在为时尚早程序还尚.
Prison Break 越狱第二季第十四集... ... delivered: 已交货，已支付的 schlock: 【揍】 treat: 对待.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... gimcrack adj 廉价的，华而不实的 | schlock adj 廉价的 undercut v 廉价出售,底切.
schlock 劣货, schlock 蹩脚货, schlock 质劣廉价货

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: apparently from Yiddish shlak 'an apoplectic stroke', shlog 'wretch, untidy person, apoplectic stroke'

entry.tran: (电影、流行歌曲或书籍的)低俗品，庸俗品
entry.def: If you refer to films, pop songs, or books as schlock, you mean that they have no artistic or social value.

example.ex: ...a showman with a good eye for marketable schlock.
example.tran: 善于发现上座率高的低俗作品的演出经理人

means.word_mean: 1. merchandise that is shoddy or inferior

auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why has the actor decided to go schlock-horror?

auth_sentence.content: We get no Disney-sponsored schlock or weak-kneed Nikita.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: We get no Disney-sponsored schlock or weak-kneed Nikita.

auth_sentence.content: "Constantine" turns Catholic doctrine, ritual, and iconography into schlock.
